articles.author: Ben Beaumont-Thomas
articles.title: Jim Gordon, session drummer on dozens of hits such as Layla, dies aged 77 - The Guardian
articles.description: After playing with the Beach Boys, George Harrison and other mid-century stars, Gordon was convicted of killing his mother during a psychotic episode in 1983
articles.content:
Jim Gordon, a session drummer in the 1960s and 70s who contributed to hits by the Beach Boys, Steely Dan and dozens more, has died aged 77.
He died in a psychiatric prison in Vacaville, California. … [+3067 chars]
